datasource_modes.query: SELECT SEV.server_id AS ID, SEV.label AS ENTITLEMENT, SEV.server_group_type_id, SEV.permanent, SEV.is_base FROM rhnServerEntitlementView SEV WHERE SEV.server_id IN (%s) ORDER BY CASE SEV.is_base WHEN 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN 'N' THEN 2 END, SEV.label

mode.name: search_custom_info
mode.query: SELECT S.id AS ID, S.name AS SERVER_NAME, (SELECT SCDV.value FROM rhnServerCustomDataValue SCDV WHERE SCDV.server_id = S.id AND UPPER(SCDV.value) LIKE UPPER(:search_string) ) AS MATCHING_FIELD, COALESCE((SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerFeaturesView SFV WHERE SFV.server_id = S.id AND SFV.label = 'ftr_system_grouping'), 0) AS SELECTABLE FROM rhnServer S, rhnSet RS WHERE RS.user_id = :user_id AND RS.label = :set_label AND RS.element = S.id ORDER BY UPPER(COALESCE(S.name, '(none)')), S.id

mode.name: search_snapshot_tag
mode.query: SELECT S.id AS ID, S.name AS SERVER_NAME, TN.name AS MATCHING_FIELD, COALESCE((SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerFeaturesView SFV WHERE SFV.server_id = S.id AND SFV.label = 'ftr_system_grouping'), 0) AS SELECTABLE FROM rhnTagName TN, rhnTag T, rhnServer S, rhnSnapshotTag ST, rhnUserServerPerms USP, web_contact wc WHERE wc.id = :user_id AND USP.user_id = :user_id AND T.org_id = wc.org_id AND T.name_id = TN.id AND (UPPER(TN.name) LIKE UPPER(:search_string)) AND USP.server_id = ST.server_id AND ST.tag_id = T.id AND ST.server_id = S.id

mode.name: search_simple
mode.query: SELECT S.id ID, S.name SERVER_NAME, S.description MATCHING_FIELD, COALESCE((SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerFeaturesView SFV WHERE SFV.server_id = S.id AND SFV.label = 'ftr_system_grouping'), 0) AS SELECTABLE FROM rhnServer S, rhnSet RS WHERE S.id = RS.element AND RS.label = :set_label AND RS.user_id = :user_id ORDER BY UPPER(COALESCE(S.name, '(none)')), S.id

mode.name: search_id
mode.elaborator: SELECT S.id, S.id AS MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServer S WHERE S.id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_cpu_model
mode.elaborator: SELECT C.server_id id, C.model MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnCpu C WHERE C.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_cpu_mhz_lt
mode.elaborator: SELECT C.server_id ID, C.mhz MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnCpu C WHERE C.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_ram_lt
mode.elaborator: SELECT R.server_id ID, R.ram MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnRAM R WHERE R.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_cpu_mhz_gt
mode.elaborator: SELECT C.server_id ID, C.mhz MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnCpu C WHERE C.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_ram_gt
mode.elaborator: SELECT R.server_id ID, R.ram MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnRAM R WHERE R.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_hwdevice_description
mode.elaborator: SELECT HD.server_id ID, HD.description || ' ' || HD.device MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnHwDevice HD WHERE HD.server_id IN (%s) AND UPPER(HD.description || HD.device) LIKE UPPER(:search_string)

mode.name: search_hwdevice_driver
mode.elaborator: SELECT HD.server_id ID, HD.description || ' - ' || HD.driver MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnHwDevice HD WHERE HD.server_id IN (%s) AND UPPER(HD.driver) LIKE UPPER(:search_string)

mode.name: search_hwdevice_device_id
mode.elaborator: SELECT HD.server_id ID, HD.description || ' - ' || HD.device_id || ' ' || HD.subdevice_id MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnHwDevice HD WHERE HD.server_id IN (%s) AND UPPER(HD.device_id || ' ' || HD.subdevice_id) LIKE UPPER(:search_string)

mode.name: search_hwdevice_vendor_id
mode.elaborator: SELECT HD.server_id ID, HD.description || ' - ' || HD.vendor_id || ' ' || HD.subvendor_id MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnHwDevice HD WHERE HD.server_id IN (%s) AND UPPER(HD.vendor_id || ' ' || HD.subvendor_id) LIKE UPPER(:search_string)

mode.name: search_dmi_system
mode.elaborator: SELECT SD.server_id ID, SD.vendor || ' ' || SD.system || ' ' || SD.product MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServerDMI SD WHERE SD.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_dmi_bios
mode.elaborator: SELECT SD.server_id ID, SD.bios_vendor || ' ' || SD.bios_version || ' - ' || SD.bios_release MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServerDMI SD WHERE SD.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_dmi_asset
mode.elaborator: SELECT SD.server_id ID, SD.asset MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServerDMI SD WHERE SD.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_hostname
mode.elaborator: SELECT SN.server_id ID, SN.hostname MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServerNetwork SN WHERE SN.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_ip
mode.elaborator: SELECT SN.server_id ID, SN.ipaddr MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServerNetwork SN WHERE SN.server_id IN(%s)

mode.name: search_installed_packages
mode.elaborator: SELECT SP.server_id ID, PN.name || '-' || PE.evr.as_vre_simple() MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnPackageName PN, rhnPackageEVR PE, rhnServerPackage SP WHERE SP.server_id IN (%s) AND PN.id = SP.name_id AND PE.id = SP.EVR_ID AND UPPER(PN.name || '-' || PE.evr.as_vre_simple()) LIKE UPPER(:search_string) ORDER BY UPPER(PN.name || '-' || PE.evr.as_vre_simple())

mode.name: search_needed_packages
mode.elaborator: SELECT DISTINCT SNPC.server_id ID, PN.name || '-' || PE.evr.as_vre_simple() MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnPackageName PN, rhnPackageEVR PE, rhnPackage P, rhnServerNeededPackageCache SNPC WHERE SNPC.server_id IN (%s) AND P.id = SNPC.package_id AND PN.id = P.name_id AND PE.id = P.EVR_ID AND UPPER(PN.name || '-' || PE.evr.as_vre_simple()) LIKE UPPER(:search_string) ORDER BY UPPER(PN.name || '-' || PE.evr.as_vre_simple())

mode.name: search_location_address
mode.elaborator: SELECT SL.server_id ID, SL.address1 || ' ' || SL.address2 || ' ' || SL.city || ', ' || SL.state || ' ' || SL.country MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServerLocation SL WHERE SL.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_location_building
mode.elaborator: SELECT SL.server_id ID, SL.building MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServerLocation SL WHERE SL.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_location_room
mode.elaborator: SELECT SL.server_id ID, SL.room MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServerLocation SL WHERE SL.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_location_rack
mode.elaborator: SELECT SL.server_id ID, SL.rack MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServerLocation SL WHERE SL.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_checkin
mode.elaborator: SELECT SI.server_id ID, TRUNC(SYSDATE - SI.checkin) MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServerInfo SI WHERE SI.server_id IN (%s)

mode.name: search_registered
mode.elaborator: SELECT S.id ID, TRUNC(SYSDATE - S.created) MATCHING_FIELD FROM rhnServer S WHERE S.id IN (%s)

datasource_modes.query: SELECT S.id ID, S.name SERVER_NAME, COALESCE((SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerFeaturesView SFV WHERE SFV.server_id = S.id AND SFV.label = 'ftr_system_grouping'), 0) AS SELECTABLE FROM rhnServer S, rhnSet RS WHERE S.id = RS.element AND RS.label = :set_label AND RS.user_id = :user_id ORDER BY UPPER(COALESCE(S.name, '(none)')), S.id

SELECT SERVER_ID AS ID, SECURITY_ERRATA, BUG_ERRATA, ENHANCEMENT_ERRATA, OUTDATED_PACKAGES, SERVER_NAME, SERVER_ADMINS, GROUP_COUNT, MODIFIED, CHANNEL_LABELS, HISTORY_COUNT, LAST_CHECKIN_DAYS_AGO, PENDING_UPDATES, OS, RELEASE, SERVER_ARCH_NAME, LAST_CHECKIN, COALESCE((SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerFeaturesView SFV WHERE SFV.server_id = OV.server_id AND SFV.label = 'ftr_system_grouping'), 0) AS SELECTABLE FROM rhnServerOverview OV WHERE server_id IN (%s) ORDER BY UPPER(COALESCE(SERVER_NAME, '(none)')), SERVER_ID
